mapper.select: SELECT *, plan_types.name AS plan_type_name, courts.name AS court_type_name FROM plans JOIN plan_types ON plans.plan_type_id = plan_types.id JOIN courts ON plans.court_type_id = courts.id

SELECT plans.id, plans.event_at, plans.time_zone, plans.maximum, plans.empty_maximum, plans.price, plan_types.name AS plan_type_name, courts.name AS court_type_name, users.name AS user_name, users.member_id, users.tel, users.user_type FROM plans JOIN plan_types ON plans.plan_type_id = plan_types.id JOIN courts ON plans.court_type_id = courts.id LEFT JOIN users ON plans.id = users.plan_id WHERE plans.id = #{id}
